Morrie Bailey leads the companyâ€™s efforts in strategic financial planning and identifying and creating new partnerships with customers. Morrieâ€™s experience and leadership have been instrumental in DCSâ€™ growth from a small start-up to an industry leader that counts major health care organizations across the country among its customers.

Morrie has spent more than three decades in business development, finance, consulting and general management with start-ups and rapidly growing public and private IT, and financial services companies. He was educated in psychology, marketing and finance and holds a BA from Amherst College and an MBA from the Amos Tuck School of Business Administration at Dartmouth College.

degrees.institution: Amos Tuck School of Business Administration
